SHOPCHEN
MAKERS
創新開發
DesignMaterialProductionMarketing
  • Design
  • Material
  • Production
  • Marketing
Apart from continuously improving organizational response ability and competitiveness, we provide quality products and services and assume environmental and social responsibilities to achieve sustainable operations.
High Efficiency Production
Complete Production Equipment
Diversified printing, including 5-color UV press, 4-color press, digital press, tape glue coating machine, and all other special printing equipment.Professional processing equipment include lathes, CNC machine tools, wood cutting and forming machines, electric embroidery machines, laser cutters, automatic stamping machines, digital forming and cutting machines, and other large machinery.
Comprehensive production machinery for creating products with unlimited possibilities.
Modernized Production Process
To organize development and production processes including design and development, material uses, cost control, and production management, we have developed and implemented the exclusive ERP system to control progress and capacity in order to balance customer requirements and cost control and thereby meet customer requirements.
Integrated process planning includes order management, stock management, A/R and A/P management, account management, production management, personnel and compensation management, production management, supply chain management, production line automatic assignment, processing machinery computerization, and remote control of manufacturing systems. To further increase productivity, we exclusively develop various automatic production equipment to reduce labor cost, enhance capacity, prevent occupational injuries or man-induced negligence of workers due to long-period working, stabilize production quality, and smooth production lines.
綠能環保
Eco-friendly and Recyclable Materials
To cherish and respect nature, we include environmental protection in our corporate policy. In product development and manufacture, we use green energy, reduce emissions, and practice environmental protection.We produce products with wood from sustainable forestry ready for FSC-certified paper processing. We are also a member of the US National Hardwood Lumber Association (NHLA) to ensure all products are made of or with wood from afforestation in order to implement sustainable forest. We also invite consumers to be friendly to the environment.
Eco-friendly Manufacture
To effectively use wood, we start from cutting wood in various basic forms for use at different stages of production to enhance yield rate and reduce wastage during processing. In addition, we color and coat wood products with water-based pigments to reduce pollution.
堅持品質
Quality Insistence
We establish the material testing laboratory for strict quality control. The laboratory is operated in compliance with the ISO/IEC 17025 General requirements for the competence of testing and calibration laboratories to conduct physical and chemical tests on the content of eight types of heavy metals, ensure products contain no toxic substances, and assure the legal compliance of products.Legal compliance: US Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act (CPSIA)/ EU Restriction of Hazardous Substances Directive (RoHS)
Laboratory Apparatus
X-ray Fluorescence Spectrometer (XRF): Testing eight types of heavy metals.ICPS-7510 Inductively coupled plasma atomic emission spectrometer: Detection of eight heavy metals.UV1800 Visible-Ultraviolet Spectrophotometer: Testing formaldehyde and hexavalent chromium.GC-MS 2010 PIUS Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrophotometer: Testing Phthalates 7P.
ISO Certification and Corporate Social Responsibility
Shenzhen Factory and Xiamen Factory occupy a total area of 38,000m2 and with 2,000 workers, complying with the ISO standards.
Quality
Implementing ISO 9001 Quality Management System: We emphasize management responsibilities, resources management, product realization, and analysis and improvement to realize high efficiency, quality services and quality products.
Environment
Promoting ISO 14001 Environmental Management System: We pay attention to energy conservation, emissions reduction, environmental protection, and pollution prevention to provide employees with a good work environment and reduce environmental hazards and risks.
Health and Safety
Promoting OHSAS 18001 Occupational Health and Safety Management System: We emphasize occupational safety prevention, hazard identification, and employee health management to protect employee health and occupational safety.
